message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll sell the product to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $112?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'll sell the product to you for $116.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $114?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned about the negotiations, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $117.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll make one more offer. I'll sell the product to you for $118.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $119?
